ticket.title: Receipt stream merge tool: set-union merge + deterministic ordering + conflict audit report

merge_evidence.note: User-initiated merge in progress as of 2026-02-17

tickets.reason: Receipts must be content-addressed and queryable.

in_scope: Implement `apm2 fac receipts merge --from <dir> --into <dir>` as set union on receipt digests.
Provide deterministic presentation ordering: HTF stamp if present else fallback tuple.
Emit audit report: duplicates, mismatched job_id for same digest (should never happen), parse failures.

criteria: Receipt sets can be merged without semantic refactor and without losing provenance.
